title: Happy Birthday, Shioriko-chan!
detail_text: <:th_ch0202/>Heh, heh, heh~ ♪ Okay~ This should go there~ ♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Isn’t that a little too much...?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Nah! Kasumin is doing it by feel!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Do you actually understand the concept of doing something by feel......?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Come on! Kasumin has common sense!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>S-Sorry. I just thought this flower wreath had way too much on it. This should go over here...... And that one...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>There isn’t too much on it! The birthday girl has the privilege of getting the cutest flower wreath! Kasumin will make today the absolute cutest day of your life!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Th-Thank you...... It’s not that I don’t trust your ability, Kasumi-san. I just wanted to trim down this wreath a bit......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Don’t make such a sad-looking face. Come on, smile! Smile! Put a big smile on your face, Shioko, just like Kasumin! Happy birthday!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>......Fufu, thank you so much, Kasumi-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
